articles.description: An American journalist says the conviction of a former Minneapolis police officer in George Floyd’s death is a step forward for the country, but that “there’s still a lot of work to be done.”

articles.title: PH mulls purchasing Moderna's coronavirus booster shot candidate - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Philippines is mulling to procure the coronavirus booster shot candidate made by American firm Moderna, vaccine czar Carlito Galvez said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, April 21)  The Philippines is mulling to procure the coronavirus booster shot candidate made by American firm Moderna, vaccine czar Carlito Galvez said on Wednesday.

articles.title: The U.S. is vaccinating millions of Americans daily, but here's why COVID-19 cases and hospitalizations are up - CTV News
articles.description: Experts say COVID-19 vaccinations in the U.S. are continuing at an impressive pace, and now all Americans 16 and up can get a shot. But a leading health official said that the country remains in a 'complicated stage' of the pandemic.

articles.title: Converge inks deal with Keppel T&T to take capacity from Bifrost Cable System - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Converge Information and Communications Technology Inc said Wednesday it has signed a binding term sheet with Keppel T&T to take capacity from one fiber pair on the Bifrost Cable System connecting Singapore to the west coast of North America.

articles.author: Channel NewsAsia
articles.title: Train To Busan actor to star in, produce US remake of Korean series Trap - CNA
articles.description: Ma Dong-seok, who’s also known as Don Lee, will play a detective investigating a group of hunters who attacked a famous news anchor and his family while on a camping trip. This is a rare instance of an American remake of a Korean show featuring a Korean lead.
